metadata.name: Automated Collection Command PowerShell
metadata.comment: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.doc')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.docx')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.xls')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.xlsx')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.ppt')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.pptx')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.rtf')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.pdf')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.txt'))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-childitem')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -recurse ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -include ')))

output.summary: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.
